title: Fox Campaigns
author: Fox Campaigns
content: REEFER Token is Setting a New Industry Standard on how Legal Dispensaries, Smoke Shops, Vape Shops, Cannabis Lounges, Restaurants and Gamers Interact. Cannabis, Crypto, NFTs & Metaverse Combined to Birth the REEFER Ecosystem Revolution!Learn more about the Reefer Token1. Bounty Campaign Starts on: 18 September - 24 September (1 week)2. $2000 worth of REEFER tokens will be distributed within 1 month after the bounty is over.3. Complete tasks and make reports every week! 4. Connect with Reefer Token in social media;- Twitter: https://twitter.com/@reefrToken- Telegram: http://t.me/ReeferToken- Instagram: http://instagram.com/reefertoken- Learn more about   Reefer Token : https://reefertoken.io/5. Tokens will be distributed depending on the quality of your work.6. Spammers, cheaters, bots, and similar participants will be banned immediately!7. Follow all the bounty groups/channels to get support and to stay updated;-  Reefer Token  Bounty: https://t.me/reefertoken_bounty- Foxcampaigns Group: https://t.me/foxcampaigns- Foxcampaigns Channel: https://t.me/foxannouncementsNote:If you are disqualified for any reason, you will NOT receive any rewards. All rights reserved by Fox Campaigns and the Reefer Token team. We can make any changes to the campaign rules, if applicable.By joining these campaigns, you're accepting these above terms.Code:Proof of authentication;Telegram username:Campaigns applied:BSC wallet address:$2000 worth of REEFER tokens will be distributed in this campaign. Only participants with quality work(s) will be rewarded;- Content Campaign: 35%- Twitter Campaign: 30%- Facebook Campaign: 15%- Instagram Campaign: 10%- Telegram Campaign: 10%Note:There is a limit of 200 participants in this campaign.Tokens:-1 - 10 stakes depending on the content quality (video/article).Rules:- Videos must have at least 200 views to qualify.- We accept original videos only with at least 3 minutes.- Only English language is accepted in videos and articles.- Write a good description about Reefer Token in your video. - Videos with no user's voice will not be accepted.- Attach Reefer Toke links in your video description and articles.- Only YouTube videos will be accepted!- 2 videos and 2 articles per person are allowed.- Articles must have at least 50 views to qualify.- We accept original articles only with at least 500 words.- Submit articles on Medium, Steem, Linkedin, ReadCash.  - Visit reefertoken.io to learn more about it and write your articles.JOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow Reefer Token Twitter account: @reefrToken3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 tweets, 5 retweets)5. Use these hashtags; #Reefertoken #BSC #foxcampaigns #cryptocurrency #blockchain #BNB #CryptoJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Twitter Report ]Twitter Profile Link:Week #:Tweet Link #1:Tweet Link #2:Tweet Link #3:Tweet Link #4:Tweet Link #5:Retweet Link #1: Retweet Link #2:Retweet Link #3:Retweet Link #4:Retweet Link #5:Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Make 2 custom posts per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.3. Minimum of 10 posts per week (10 custom posts)4. Use these hashtags; #Reefertoken #BSC #foxcampaigns #cryptocurrency #blockchain #BNB #CryptoJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Facebook Report ]Twitter Profile Link:Week #:Post Link #1:Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Post Link #6:Post Link #7:Post Link #8:Post Link #9:Post Link #10:Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow Reefer Token Instagram account: @reefertoken3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 posts, 5 reposts)5. Use these hashtags; #Reefertoken #BSC #foxcampaigns #cryptocurrency #blockchain #BNB #CryptoJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Instagram Report ]Twitter Profile Link:Week #:Post Link #1:Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Share Link #1: Share Link #2:Share Link #3:Share Link #4:Share Link #5:Stakes:- 1 quality post: 1 stake.- 20 one-time stakes for wearing Reefer Token avatar and name.- Wear the Avatar until the end of the campaign and you will get stakes.- Download AvatarRules:1. Must join Reefer Token group: http://t.me/ReeferToken2. Write posts in the official Reefer Token group (only quality posts accepted)3. If you write any spam message you will be banned immediately4. Max posts per day: 2, Max posts per week: 105. You can ask questions about Reefer Token in the official group, but do not Spam!6. You will not be paid if you remove the avatar before the end of the campaign!7. DO NOT USE HASHTAGS IN YOUR TELEGRAM POSTS!JOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Telegram Report ]Week #:Post Link #1:Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Post Link #6:Post Link #7:Post Link #8:Post Link #9:Post Link #10:Week 01: 18 Sept - Sept 24
